summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5970 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 16, H. E. Nelson Addition, et al., being the alley between 24th Avenue Northwest and 25th Avenue Northwest, from West 77th Street to West 80th Street; and certain other alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 79767, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
